ai-mil3.1.4:1.2_0: “This mendicant is astute, competent, and capable of having questioned me. They will be capable of having asked many positions, and there will be for the sake of their having asked: ‘Why don’t I be like the sun?’
ai-mil3.1.4:2.2_0: “Well then, Your Majesty, go to the royal compound.”
ai-mil3.1.4:2.3_0: Having said this, he got up from his seat and left the kingdom and went to the elephant stables, where he put on his way to the chariot.
ai-mil3.1.4:3.1_0: And the gods said to him,
ai-mil3.1.4:3.3_0: ‘Among the royal compound will be a big in the royal compound.’”
ai-mil3.1.4:3.4_0: Saying, “Listening,” the Elder did not speak.
ai-mil3.1.4:3.5_0: The following morning the nights, and the king went to Macchikāsaṇḍa and bowed, and sat down to one side. And they said to him,
ai-mil3.1.4:3.6_0: “Go, great king, the elephant; I’m coming.”
ai-mil3.1.4:3.8_0: “Why shouldn’t you come with the monks?”
ai-mil3.1.4:4.3_0: A second time the King asked the same question
ai-mil3.1.4:4.7_0: and a third time the King asked
ai-mil3.1.4:4.9_0: and a third time it said,
ai-mil3.1.4:4.11_0: “But so, Sakya, I’m going to tell the mendicants about army with the mendicants.
ai-mil3.1.4:4.12_0: This is why I’m speaking only of all? Is there any other meals for the monks?”
ai-mil3.1.4:4.13_0: When this was said, the humiliated became embarrassed.
ai-mil3.1.4:5.1_0: Soon afterwards the gods were unable to respond to Madhurā and Nāgadhanika, and they approached Nāga and said,
ai-mil3.1.4:5.3_0: the monks wishes to come with them.”
ai-mil3.1.4:5.4_0: Then Dragon robed up in the morning and, taking his bowl and robe, entered Sāgata.
ai-mil3.1.4:6.1_0: While going to Venerable Nāgasamāla said to Venerable Sela,
ai-mil3.1.4:6.5_0: “Sir, whoever goes inside along within ten servings, is he who practises his life.”
ai-mil3.1.4:6.6_0: “But if that man left his house, wasn’t I left out? Would that person have left?”
ai-mil3.1.4:6.8_0: “But these things that are created, sharken, or animals return again.”
ai-mil3.1.4:6.10_0: “But these wounds shave to their wounds, slaves, or burn them again.”
ai-mil3.1.4:6.12_0: “But these castes are scared to be a monkey, who does not enter again?”
ai-mil3.1.4:6.15_0: “I’m not able to talk together with you, sir.”
ai-mil3.1.4:6.16_0: “Breathing is impressive in-breaths and out-breaths are an elder.”
ai-mil3.1.4:7.1_0: The fourth Question About the fourth
